name: Sudoku - Premium Puzzle
description:
Sudoku - Classic Puzzle is the classic logic puzzle game with numbers - suitable for all ages and levels. Play easier levels to exercise your brain or challenge yourself with expert/advanced difficulty to give your mind a real workout.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, or try expert levels to give your mind a real workout. Our Sudoku has some features that make the game easier for you.


Features:

• Endless Sudoku games in 5 different difficulty settings.
• Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block.
• Unlimited Undo button.
• Autosave feature so you can stop and resume the game anytime.

Train your brain with Sudoku anywhere, anytime.
